name: Reusable Beeswax Wraps
description: Smart food storage made with beeswax-infused cloth, replacing plastic wraps. Durable, washable, and biodegradable—perfect blend of tradition and eco-tech for zero-waste lifestyles.

name: Bamboo Toothbrushes
description: An eco-tech upgrade for oral care. These biodegradable bamboo toothbrushes reduce plastic pollution while maintaining hygiene with soft, BPA-free bristles and a compostable handle.

name: Plant-Based Biodegradable Trash Bags
description: Tech-driven biodegradable trash bags made from plants. Break down naturally without polluting soil or water, offering a sustainable, future-ready alternative to traditional plastic garbage bags.

name: Solar-Powered Power Banks
description: Eco-tech charging solution powered by the sun. This solar power bank stores clean energy, perfect for outdoor use, emergencies, and reducing your carbon footprint.

name: Recycled Paper Stationery
description: Smartly recycled notebooks using tech-optimized processing. Reduces paper waste and promotes green living with zero-bleach, chemical-free paper—ideal for school, office, or journaling needs.

name: Eco-Friendly Detergents
description: Green chemistry meets eco-tech cleaning. Biodegradable laundry detergent removes stains without harming nature, using plant enzymes and sustainable packaging for a cleaner planet.

name: Cloth Shopping Bags
description: Tech-enhanced reusable cloth bags designed for strength, style, and sustainability. Replace plastic bags with washable, long-lasting fabric built to support eco-smart shopping habits.

name: Shampoo Bars
description: Advanced zero-waste haircare. Solid shampoo bars packed with natural oils and no plastic packaging. Eco-tech solution for healthy hair and a cleaner planet.

name: Bamboo Cutlery Sets
description: Portable bamboo cutlery infused with sustainable innovation. Replace single-use plastic utensils with this reusable, antibacterial, and stylish set—an essential eco-tech switch for conscious living.

name: Compost Bins
description: Compact kitchen compost bin powered by odor-blocking eco-tech. Transforms organic waste into nutrient-rich compost, encouraging greener homes and cleaner landfills.

name: Upcycled Furniture
description: Furniture reborn through eco-tech upcycling. Crafted from reclaimed wood, each piece combines sustainability with smart design, reducing landfill waste and carbon emissions.

name: LED Bulbs
description: Low-energy, high-efficiency LED bulbs with smart eco-tech engineering. Cut electricity usage and carbon footprint with long-lasting lighting technology.

name: Eco-Bricks
description: Plastic waste meets eco-engineering. Eco-bricks are durable blocks formed from reused plastic, perfect for green construction and educational projects.

name: Coconut Shell Bowls
description: Crafted using nature and tech, these coconut bowls are biodegradable, lightweight, and perfect for serving meals sustainably with zero waste.

name: Natural Fiber Clothing
description: Breathe in eco-fashion. Clothing made from tech-processed natural fibers like hemp and bamboo, offering comfort, style, and sustainability in every thread.

name: Biodegradable Phone Cases
description: Eco-smart phone protection made from compostable materials. Durable, stylish, and fully biodegradable—tech meets sustainability in your daily accessories.

name: Solar Garden Lights
description: Illuminate outdoors using solar energy. Smart sensors charge by day, glow by night. A beautiful blend of renewable energy and sustainable design.

name: Refillable Cleaning Spray Bottles
description: Reusable spray bottles designed for tablet-based cleaning solutions. Eco-tech cleaning innovation reduces plastic waste and encourages sustainable home care.

name: Paper Seed Pencils
description: Write your ideas, then plant them. These biodegradable pencils contain seeds and merge writing with growing—a clever eco-tech product for students and artists.

name: Solar Powered Water Purifiers
description: Harness solar power to purify water anywhere. Tech-powered filtration removes contaminants while staying off-grid—ideal for emergencies and eco-friendly living.
